At first, I thought I was just paranoid, but then I started seeing shadows and hearing whispers that weren’t there. I felt like I was outside my body, and I couldn’t move or speak for a few minutes, like I was frozen. I’ve been really anxious and convinced that everyone around me is dangerous or plotting something. I’ve never experienced anything like this before, and I’m pretty scared about what’s happening to me.
